attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a growing percentage of would-be retirees in this country, working pensioners who only get the state pension and have no choice but to work to survive and we want the taxation on the state pension to be abolished. We pay pension on our salaries and that should be enough.  If tax was not paid on the pension, it would be worth going to work.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
